value.message: Variable '_config' uses an arbitrary abbreviation and single character prefix; not descriptive.
Function name 'createTelemetryAccess' is a noun-verb combination; should be verb-noun or verb only.

createTelemetryManager and createCollector accept config objects directly from caller without verifying resource ownership or user authorization. This may allow IDOR if config contains sensitive resource IDs controlled by client input.
value.suggestion: Add backend-side authorization checks to ensure the caller is permitted to access or modify resources referenced in the config object. Do not rely solely on IDs provided by the client.
